ygData.subject: Heritrix 3.1.1 hanging (snoozed) after about 15 minutes...just sits idle!!‏
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I am using Heritrix 3.1.1 with the default configuration out of the box (on debian linux). I have created a job with the only real change in the xml config

Hi,

I am using Heritrix 3.1.1 with the default configuration out of the bo=
x (on debian linux).
I have created a job with the only real change in the =
xml config file being the use of 'MirrorWriter' as opposed to the 'WarcWrit=
er'.

I have tried capturing this website http://www.wordiz.com. Everything=
 looks fine up until about 15 to 17 minutes towards the capture where the j=
ob says it is 'running' but nothing is really happening after that. The log=
 is not changing. I have checked the other logs (alert, the heritrix_out.lo=
g, etc..). None is showing any signs of problems or issues.

I have tried r=
unning the job twice....and the same thing pretty much happens....Heritrix =
is just hanging there. It has been hanging there for the last 45 minutes or=
 so. I have checked the memory...everything looks ok..still plenty.

Am I m=
issing something ?? is there a problem with the site I am visiting?
